pullRequest.title: CAMEL-13830: Remove examples folder
pullRequest.bodyText: This will remove the examples folder. However I had to remove the generation of the examples docs from the gulp file, perhaps @zregvart if you if have any hints on how I can manage the docs for the examples in the new repo, would be highly appreciated :)

commit.message:
Add a comment to gulpfile.js
